definition: member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker

sentences.english: The fire proves gold, adversity brave men.
In those years, workers lived right on those cliffs.
sentences.chinese: 當年修渠的勇士們就住在那些山崖上。

sentences.english: Huscarls are professional warriors in the pay of the King and his earls.
sentences.chinese: 哈斯卡爾斯人是國王和伯爵們僱傭的專業勇士。

sentences.english: The survivors of the bowmen, the warriors of Kedar, will be few.
sentences.chinese: 弓箭手所餘剩的，就是基達人的勇士，必然稀少。

sentences.english: Is price of beautiful Lida mountain bike warrior a number?
sentences.chinese: 美利達山地車勇士的價格是多少？

sentences.english: Han Jia, are there any of the tools used by the builders among in the exhibits?
sentences.chinese: 韓佳，這裏有沒有展出修渠勇士們使用的工具啊？

sentences.english: He raised his spear against three hundred men, whom he killed, and so he became as famous as the Three.
sentences.chinese: 他舉槍殺了三百人，就在三個勇士裏得了名。

sentences.english: How say ye, We are mighty and strong men for the war?
sentences.chinese: 你們怎嗎說，我們是勇士，是有勇力打仗的呢。

sentences.english: The Warriors won the game by blowing away Rocket 101-87.
sentences.chinese: 勇士隊以101比87擊敗了火箭隊而贏得了比賽。

sentences.english: Britain´s first seagoing ironclad warship, HMS Warrior, was launched.
sentences.chinese: 英國第一艘遠洋裝甲戰艇“勇士號”下水。

sentences.english: And the sons of Meselemia, and their brethren strong men, were eighteen.
sentences.chinese: 默舍肋米雅的子孫和弟兄，都是勇士，共計十八人。

sentences.english: We are all warriors in the darkness.
sentences.chinese: 我們都是那黑夜中的勇士。

sentences.english: It's like the 4)Gurkha of the plant kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 它就像是植物王國裏的廓爾喀族勇士。

sentences.english: Claire Bowes reports on the sinking of the Rainbow Warrior.
sentences.chinese: 克萊爾鮑伊斯在“彩虹勇士號”的沉船處爲您報道。

sentences.english: He wanted to honor the brave men who had died at Gettysburg.
sentences.chinese: 他想表彰那些獻身於葛底斯堡戰役中的勇士們。

definition: horseman/cavalryman/knight (i.e. European nobility)/(Tw) bike rider (scooter, bicycle etc)
Kohl (name)/Helmut Kohl (1930-2017), German CDU politician, Chancellor 1982-1998
